body:
I've tried a couple of go environments, and a couple of coredns versions, and all of them bomb out with the same weirdo go dependency errors. From this, I have determined that the build instructions in the README, which suggest simply running `go get ./...`, are incorrect.

The errors:
```
package github.com/coredns/coredns/middleware/pkg/debug: cannot find package "github.com/coredns/coredns/middleware/pkg/debug" in any of:
	/usr/local/go/src/github.com/coredns/coredns/middleware/pkg/debug (from $GOROOT)
	/go/src/github.com/coredns/coredns/middleware/pkg/debug (from $GOPATH)
package k8s.io/client-go/1.5/kubernetes: cannot find package "k8s.io/client-go/1.5/kubernetes" in any of:
	/usr/local/go/src/k8s.io/client-go/1.5/kubernetes (from $GOROOT)
	/go/src/k8s.io/client-go/1.5/kubernetes (from $GOPATH)
package k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api: cannot find package "k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api" in any of:
	/usr/local/go/src/k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api (from $GOROOT)
	/go/src/k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api (from $GOPATH)
package k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api/unversioned: cannot find package "k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api/unversioned" in any of:
	/usr/local/go/src/k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api/unversioned (from $GOROOT)
	/go/src/k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api/unversioned (from $GOPATH)
package k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api/v1: cannot find package "k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api/v1" in any of:
	/usr/local/go/src/k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api/v1 (from $GOROOT)
	/go/src/k8s.io/client-go/1.5/pkg/api/v1 (from $GOPATH)
```

To test, I've been using this trivial Dockerfile:

```bash
printf '
FROM golang:1-alpine
RUN apk update && apk add git
RUN git clone https://github.com/coredns/coredns
WORKDIR coredns
RUN git checkout -b rel v011 && go get ./...
' > Dockerfile && docker build .
```

Also fails on `1.9-alpine`, `1.8-stretch`, and my local Ubuntu machine. I note the build on Travis does plenty more work to resolve dependencies. Maybe simply update the README to explain that building is currently hard?
title: Can't build: resolving dependencies fails
